titles.title: To amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to eliminate the requirement that central station service be unavailable in the case of rural electrification loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment, Credit and Rural Development.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to eliminate the requirement that central station service be unavailable in the case of rural electrification loans.
